$$\sum_{i=1}^{20}{\sum_{j=2}^5{\frac{i^3}{2+ij}}}$$
```{r}
ej3<-function(i,j){

  for(i in 1:20){
    for(j in 2:5)
      r<-(i^3)/(2+i*j)
  }
  return(r)
  ej(3,4)
}

ej4<-function(x){
  n<-length(x)
  c_var<-sd(x)/mean(x)
  c_asimP<-1/n*(sum(x-mean(x))^3)
  x<-sort(x)
  if(n%%2==0){
  me<-(x[n/2]+x[n/2+1])/2
  } else {
  me<-x[ceiling(n/2)]
  }
  c_asimF<-(3*(mean(x)-me))/sd(x)
  aux<-list(c_var,c_asimP,c_asimF)
  return(aux)
}
v<-c(1:10)
ej4(v)

```
